p: PRCV infects the respiratory tract with limited or no shedding in faeces (Pensaert 1989). The first isolation of PRCV was from Belgium in 1984 (Pensaert et al. 1986) and 1989. PRCV was detected in the USA in the herds without a prior history of TGEV infection or vaccination (Hill et al. 1990; Wesley et al. 1990). Antibodies produced in PRCV-infected pigs neutralise the TGEV.
